lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh's mayor recently stood down on his proposal to impose a "Fair Share Tax" on the tuition of college students, instead persuading local institutions to increase their voluntary contributions to the city.
snippet: Hamilton College gives its host community a donation to help pay for a new fire truck.

headline.main: College Gives Town $250,000 for a Fire Truck

abstract: Hamilton College gives its host community a donation to help pay for a new fire truck.
